code:
sequenceDiagram
  participant U as User
  participant F as Frontend
  participant API as API v1
  participant Sol as Solana devnet

  U->>F: Complete mission (score >= threshold)
  F->>API: POST /journeys/{id}/mint-badge
  API->>Sol: send transaction
  Sol-->>API: signature
  API-->>F: signature + explorerUrl
  F->>U: Show success + link to Solscan
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。
